.NET Framework 3.5.name: VRTK_SpringJointGrabAttach
.NET Framework 3.5.summary: The Spring Joint Grab Attach script is used to create a simple Spring Joint connection between the object and the grabbing object.
.NET Framework 3.5.example: VRTK/Examples/021_Controller_GrabbingObjectsWithJoints demonstrates this grab attach mechanic on the Drawer object in the scene.

methods.name: CreateJoint(GameObject obj)
